name: Space Aid - Galaxy tour
description:
One tap easy controls and addictive gameplay mechanics.

In the open space are astronauts who need to be rescued.
Control the ship and save as many astronauts as possible.

- Complete all 500 levels
- Complete many challenges
- Collect 8 awesome ships
- Unlock 5 themes
- Compare your highscore with players worldwide
- Save all the astronauts!
